1001.story: You wake up. You must have snoozed the alarm a few too many times because it’s 7:30am and you have to be at work at 8. Luckily it’s only 3 miles away.

1002.story: You head to the bathroom and turn on the faucet. You stand outside of the shower naked, reaching under the shower head to feel to cold water. Three minutes pass before it’s finally hot enough. You get in and take the fastest shower you can manage.

1003.story: You get to the kitchen and check the pantry.

1003b.story: You get to the kitchen and check the pantry.

1004.story: You put on your work uniform and dorky nametag. You wore both the shirt and pants yesterday but you only have two uniforms and the other’s in the laundry. Oh well.

1004b.story: You put on your work uniform and dorky nametag. You wore both the shirt and pants yesterday but you only have two uniforms and the other’s in the laundry. Oh well.

1004c.story: You put on your work uniform and dorky nametag. You wore both the shirt and pants yesterday but you only have two uniforms and the other’s in the laundry. Oh well.

1005.button_text: Make a bowl of cereal with the remnants of the Corn Flakes
1005.story: The Corn Flakes were bland but they get the job done. You brush your teeth, put on your work uniform, then grab your coat, keys, and wallet. You head out of your apartment to your car.

1005b.story: You grab your keys and wallet. You head out of your apartment to your car.

1005c.button_text: No time! I've gotta get to work.
1005c.story: You grab your keys and wallet. You head out of your apartment to your car.

1005d.button_text: Give her a good, long pet. Maybe a few head scratches too.
1005d.story: You grab your keys and wallet. You head out of your apartment to your car.

1005e.button_text: Make a bowl of cereal with the remnants of the Corn Flakes
1005e.story: You brush your teeth, put on your work uniform, then grab your coat, keys, and wallet. You head out of your apartment to your car.

1006.button_text: Take the box of frozen waffles
1006.story: The frozen waffles aren’t frozen at all. They’re soft and damp. Why were they in the pantry?

1007.story: You shovel down half a Pop-Tart while heading to the door but stop when you realize... you’re still naked.

1008.button_text: Get a banana from that cheap plastic banana hanger on the counter behind you
1008.story: You unpeel the banana and realize you forgot to do something...

1009.story: After a quick bathroom break (and a 30-second handwash!) you see your ___ curled up by the bathtub.

1011.story: [pet_name] looks up at you with sleepy eyes.

1012.button_text: Take the elevator down to the parking garage
1012.story: You wait a minute while the elevator gathers its passengers from the floors above and hop on. You share an awkward smile with the woman you’ve met here a dozen times but never asked her name.

1013.button_text: Take the elevator down to the parking garage
1013.story: You wait a minute for the elevator and realize it’s broken. Again. Stairs it is.

1014.button_text: Walk down 4 flights of stairs, so you can cut through the lobby to the garage

1015.button_text: Walk down 4 flights of stairs, so you can cut through the lobby to the garage
